access.description: A list of what content this account has access to.

age.description: The age of the account in seconds.

build_storage_slots.description: The amount of build storage slot an account has unlocked. Requires the additional `builds` scope. This field is only present when a Schema version of `2019-12-19T00:00:00.000Z` or later is requested.

commander.description: True if the player has bought a commander tag.

created.description: An ISO-8601 standard timestamp of when the account was created.

daily_ap.description: The daily AP the account has. Requires the additional `progression` scope.

fractal_level.description: The account's personal fractal reward level. Requires the additional `progression` scope.

guild_leader.description: A list of guilds the account is leader of. Requires the additional guilds scope.

guilds.description: A list of guilds assigned to the given account.

last_modified.description: An ISO-8601 standard timestamp of when the account information last changed as perceived by the API. This field is only present when a Schema version of `2019-02-21T00:00:00Z` or later is requested

monthly_ap.description: The monthly AP the account has. Requires the additional `progression` scope.

name.description: The unique account name with numerical suffix. It is possible that the name change. Do not rely on the name, use id instead.

world.description: The id of the home world the account is assigned to. Can be resolved against `/v2/worlds`.

wvw_rank.description: The account's personal wvw rank. Requires the additional `progression` scope.
